Posts.EditableText: I was trying to play a game and it said it was age restricted.  I updated my profile ( I am way older than 18).  Still doesn't let me play.  Any ideas?
Posts.HTML: I was trying to play a game and it said it was age restricted. I updated my profile ( I am way older than 18). Still doesn't let me play. Any ideas?

Posts.EditableText: If you change your age, you need to log off and log in again before it will update the "adult content" flag
Posts.HTML: If you change your age, you need to log off and log in again before it will update the "adult content" flag
